page.title: 04Leisure Activities.
page.content: Arts and Crafts: Two independent craft shops have recently been set up, one in Netherwitton and one at a farm nearby (Shelley). Both craftsmen design and make pine furniture of a high standard. Leek Club: The Leek Club has over 40 members. Money is collected during the year by a raffle and other functions to provide prizes at the annual Leek Show in September. Every exhibitor wins a prize. Scouts: The 2 Scout companies are extremely lively thanks to excellent leaders. There are 16 cub scouts and 20 scouts. They meet once a week in the W.I.Hall. Unfortunately it is only for boys.
